title: The Wake Crasher
description: A dark humor, romantic comedy that explores the world of the 'Wake Crashers'. A bunch of young adults that decide a fun way to get a few free drinks and a bite to eat would be to crash a few funerals.They soon discover there is no such thing as a 'free lunch' and they get more than they expect when they embark on their exercise of 'harmless fun', including new love. Strangely enough one or two people think they are actually a bit sick and any relationships formed via their illicit activities are based on deceit and dishonesty.So which side of the fence do you sit on, harmless fun or a bunch of sicko's?
author: Robert Durrant
